cves.description: IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.3.0.7 through 6.3.0.7 Service Pack 20 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.

IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.3.0.7 through 6.3.0.7 Service Pack 20 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.

The Request a Quote Form plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution in version less than, or equal to, 2.5.2 via the emd_form_builder_lite_pagenum function. This is due to the plugin not properly validating user input before using it as a function name. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute code on the server, however, parameters can not be passed to the functions called.

affected.product: Request a Quote Form Plugin – Price Quote Request Management Made Easy

problemType: CWE-95 Improper Neutralization of Directives in Dynamically Evaluated Code ('Eval Injection')

cves.description: Memory corruption while processing IOCTL command with larger buffer in Bluetooth Host.

versions.version: Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 5G Compute Platform (SC8180X-AC, AF) "Poipu Pro"

problemType: CWE-129 Improper Validation of Array Index

cves.description: Memory corruption while processing DDI command calls.
Memory corruption while processing an IOCTL command with an arbitrary address.
Memory corruption while processing DDI call with invalid buffer.
problemType: CWE-129 Improper Validation of Array Index

cves.description: NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability where a user could cause a memory allocation with excessive size value, leading to a segmentation fault, by providing an invalid request. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service.
problemType: CWE-789 Memory Allocation with Excessive Size Value

cves.description: Transient DOS while creating NDP instance.
Transient DOS while processing an ANQP message.

versions.version: Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 5G Compute Platform (SC8180X-AC, AF) "Poipu Pro"

cves.description: Memory corruption while processing specific files in Powerline Communication Firmware.
problemType: CWE-120 Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')

cves.description:
EXTRA_REFERRER resource read vulnerability in the Gallery module.
Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

:Vulnerability of insufficient data length verification in the DFA module.
Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the dms_fwk module.
Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can cause RCE.

Race condition issue occurring in the physical page import process of the memory management module.
Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service integrity.
problemType: CWE-362 Concurrent Execution using Shared Resource with Improper Synchronization ('Race Condition')

cves.description: Out-of-bounds write in detaching crypto box in Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.17.2 allows local privileged attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.
Improper access control in SemSensorManager for Galaxy Watch prior to SMR Aug-2025 Release 1 allows local attackers to access sensitive information related to outdoor exercise and sleep time.

versions.version: SMR Aug-2025 Release in Android Watch 16

cves.description: NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in the Python backend, where an attacker could cause an out-of-bounds read by manipulating shared memory data. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to information disclosure.

Vulnerability of returning released pointers in the distributed notification service.
Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

Iterator failure vulnerability in the card management module.
Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect function stability.
problemType: CWE-664 Improper Control of a Resource Through its Lifetime

cves.description: Out-of-bounds write in drawing pinpad in Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.17.2 allows local privileged attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.
Out-of-bounds write in creating bitmap images in Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.17.2 allows local privileged attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.
Information disclosure while processing a packet at EAVB BE side with invalid header length.
problemType: CWE-120 Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')

cves.description: Improper authorization in Samsung Health prior to version 6.30.1.003 allows local attackers to access data in Samsung Health. User interaction is required for triggering this vulnerability.
Improper access control in fall detection for Galaxy Watch prior to SMR Aug-2025 Release 1 allows local attackers to modify fall detection configuration.

versions.version: SMR Aug-2025 Release in Android Watch 16

cves.description: Out-of-bounds read in Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.17.2 allows local privileged attackers to read out-of-bounds memory.
Improper access control in PkgPredictorService prior to SMR Aug-2025 Release 1 in Chinese Android 13, 14, 15 and 16 allows local attackers to use the privileged APIs.

versions.version: SMR Aug-2025 Release in Chinese Android 13, 14, 15, 16

cves.description: Improper export of android application component in Emergency SoS prior to SMR Aug-2025 Release 1 allows local attackers to access sensitive information.
problemType: CWE-926 : Improper Export of Android Application Components

cves.description: The Zakra theme for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized data modification due to a missing capability check on the welcome_notice_import_handler() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to import demo settings.
Path Traversal in Document scanner prior to SMR Aug-2025 Release 1 allows local attackers to delete file with Document scanner's privilege.
problemType: CWE-22 Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')

cves.description:
Kenwood DMX958XR Protection Mechanism Failure Software Downgrade Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows physically present attackers to downgrade software on affected installations of Kenwood DMX958XR devices. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

The specific flaw exists within the libSystemLib library. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of version information before performing an update. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-26355.

Kenwood DMX958XR Firmware Update Command Injection Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows physically present attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Kenwood DMX958XR devices. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

The specific flaw exists within the firmware update process. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute a system call. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-26260.
problemType: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')

cves.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability exists in Dell (acquired by Quest) KACE K1000 System Management Appliance version 5.0 - 5.3, 5.4 prior to 5.4.76849, and 5.5 prior to 5.5.90547 in the download_agent.php endpoint. An attacker can upload arbitrary PHP files to a temporary web-accessible directory, which are later executed through inclusion in backend code that loads files under attacker-controlled paths.
problemType: CWE-434 Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
CWE-306 Missing Authentication for Critical Function
